unnormalised: Energy & Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices Stir Chai Discussions!
normalised: energy and utilities: gas cylinder prices stir chai discussions!

unnormalised: Hey folks, grab your chai and samosas, because gas cylinder prices are making headlines again! Remember aunty Sharma complaining last month? Well, it's probably worse now.
normalised: hey folks, grab your chai and samosas, because gas cylinder prices are making headlines again! remember aunty sharma complaining last month? well, it is probably worse now.

unnormalised: Sources suggest that domestic LPG cylinder prices might see another hike soon. Industry experts are whispering about a potential Rs. 50 increase per cylinder. That’s going to pinch everyone from Delhi to Darjeeling.
normalised: sources suggest that domestic L P G cylinder prices might see another hike soon. industry experts are whispering about a potential rupee fifty increase per cylinder. that is going to pinch everyone from delhi to darjeeling.

unnormalised: “Itna mehenga? How will we manage, beta?” exclaimed Mrs. Chatterjee from Kolkata, a sentiment echoed across homes.
normalised: “itna mehenga? how will we manage, beta?” exclaimed missus chatterjee from kolkata, a sentiment echoed across homes.

unnormalised: Analysts at ICICI Securities predict that global energy costs and fluctuating rupee values are to blame. They estimate a potential impact of Rs. 100 on the average household’s monthly budget.
normalised: analysts at I C I C I securities predict that global energy costs and fluctuating rupee values are to blame. they estimate a potential impact of rupee one hundred on the average household is monthly budget.

unnormalised: Dr. Reddy, an economist from JNU, suggests government subsidies may need revisiting. The price of commercial cylinders, used by restaurants and small businesses covering areas like a 500 sq ft dhaba, is also expected to increase. Let’s see how this plays out! Stay tuned for updates.
normalised: doctor reddy, an economist from J N U, suggests government subsidies may need revisiting. the price of commercial cylinders, used by restaurants and small businesses covering areas like a five hundred square feet dhaba, is also expected to increase. let us see how this plays out! stay tuned for updates.
